item.title: Oracle Instant Client and Python on M1
item.description: Setting up your M1 Mac for linking and running x86 software. Build and run x86 Python natively (and with Docker)

item.title: Building this site with HUGO
item.description: How I went from knowing nothing about HUGO framework to publishing my first custom website in just few days, all thanks to HUGO great ecosystem.
